mapper.select:
SELECT regDate, compName, empName, workStatus, nextDeptName, nextDutyName, nextPositionName, previousDeptName, previousDutyName, previousPositionName, mainDeptYn FROM
movePersonnelStatus_Y
movePersonnelStatus_N
WHERE `query` = '"*${empName}*";limit=100050;mode=boolean;maxmatches=100050;' AND regDate >= #{startDate} AND regDate <= #{endDate} AND compName = #{compName} AND mainDeptYn = #{mainDeptYn} limit 0, 200000;
